Phrases.SAFE_DIALOG_SYSTEM_CHANGES_HEADER: Before using Safe, we recommend making the following changes to your system:
Phrases.SAFE_DIALOG_SYSTEM_CHANGES_FOOTER: These changes are critical for ensuring your privacy when using Safe but may not be necessary for your use case. If in doubt, we strongly recommend making these changes.

Safe.NAME: Name
Safe.WE_ARE_UNABLE_TO_MOUNT_MORE_THAN_A_SINGL: We are unable to mount more than a single Safe at a time on Windows XP. Would you like to unmount
Safe.RUN_WINXP_WARNING_DIALOG_B: is degraded while running under Windows XP. This is not a strictly a limitation of
Safe.RUN_WINXP_WARNING_DIALOG_C: and most security products on Windows XP suffer from the same weakness.\n\nIf you expect that the only people who will ever have access to your internal hard disk are trusted, then this is not an issue. Otherwise we don't recommend running
Safe.RUN_WINXP_WARNING_DIALOG_D: in this environment unless you know exactly what you're doing.
